name: listReduceRight
description:
This function iterates over every element of the list and calls the closure to work on that element. This function will reduce the list to a single value, from the right to the left, and will return the value.
NOTE: Use caution if using the member function. `list.reduceRight` and `list.listReduceRight` may behave differently.
NOTE:This function is not available in Lucee 5.x or lower. Potentially use `reverse()` instead.

params.name: callback
params.description: Closure or a function reference that will be called for each iteration.

callback_params.name: result
callback_params.description: The result of the reduce operation after the previous iteration.

callback_params.name: item
callback_params.description: The value for the current iteration's item.

callback_params.name: index
callback_params.description: The current index for the iteration.

callback_params.name: list
callback_params.description: A reference of the original list.

params.name: initialValue
params.description: Initial value which will be used for the reduce operation.
